post_message: PLUS-SIZED MODEL: Model Robyn Lawley just became the first plus-sized model to snag a page in Sports Illustrated's swimsuit edition. Do you think it's a step in the right direction for the modeling industry? Or is it sending the wrong message?

commenter_a: Sex is meant for procreation. If you don't want kids the only sure way is to not have sex. Birth control, even when packaged correctly is not 100% I have had multiple friends become pregnant while properly using birth control. Stupidest reason to sue ever.
